Question
========

In a descriptive study, 50 patients with breathing difficulties, the number of seconds they could can hold their breath. The results are shown in the histogram below shown. The percentage of people who can hold their breath for more than 55 seconds holding their breath in this sample is equal to

![](uva-bar-graph-319-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 10%
* 18%
* 26%
* 36%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 10%: Incorrect
* 18%: Incorrect
* 26%: Incorrect
* 36%: Correct
